article.text: Is this how they write about the factory?

dantes_inferno.text: The darkest places of hell are reserved for– oh, blast it! What does Dante know?

safezone.text: Those buggers cannot follow me in here, can they?

text: I must be a bit peaky… Yes– yes, that’s it!

mailbin.text: He was always so prompt with his correspondence.

text: But there is nothing else for them to find. I’ve made sure of it...

engine_fall.text: Bloody hell! What is causing all of this?!

text: Finally… a way out of this hellhole.
I should make my way to the factory floor exit. Posthaste.
Archie always snatched up the most luxurious decor for his office… however garish they were.
If I had his kind of money, my office would-- Bah… if only.
